name: Port Madrona
description:
Port Madrona is a game demo by the following developers:

  • Darlene Barahona - Writer
  • Emily Ogle - Writer
  • Marlene Plasencia -Writer
  • Hayley Campbell - Artist
  • Legendary Vermin - Programmer/UI Artist

It's a horror/dating-sim/visual novel featuring the adventures of Kai in the titular city of Port Madrona.
